text.en: Rust 1.93.0 was released on January 22, 2026 (branched from master on December 5, 2025). This release brings 13 language features, 18 newly stabilized APIs, and important changes to the compiler, standard library, and Cargo.
text.zh: Rust 1.93.0 于 2026 年 1 月 22 日发布（2025 年 12 月 5 日从 master 分支）。本次发布包含 13 项语言特性、18 个新稳定化 API，以及编译器、标准库和 Cargo 的重要变更。

description.en: Conditional assembly compilation (cfg within asm! blocks) is now stable
description.zh: 条件汇编编译（asm! 块内的 cfg）正式稳定

description.en: Promoted from warn to deny-by-default, catching null pointer dereferences more aggressively at compile time
description.zh: 从 warn 提升为 deny-by-default，编译期更严格地捕获空指针解引用

description.en: New warn-by-default lint for casting function pointers as integers
description.zh: 新增 warn-by-default lint，警告将函数指针转换为整数的行为

title.zh: C 风格可变参数函数

description.en: Stabilized declaration of variadic functions for the system ABI
description.zh: 为 system ABI 稳定化可变参数函数声明

description.en: Now errors when keywords are used as config predicates
description.zh: 当关键字被用作 cfg 谓词时现在会报错

description.en: Warns against mutating interior-mutable const items (e.g., const X: Cell<i32>)
description.zh: 警告对内部可变 const 项的修改（如 const X: Cell<i32>）

description.en: During const-evaluation, support copying pointers byte-by-byte
description.zh: 在常量求值期间，支持逐字节复制指针

description.en: Allows const items that contain mutable references to static items
description.zh: 允许 const 项包含指向 static 项的可变引用

description.en: Function item types and differing function safeties now handled correctly
description.zh: 正确处理函数项类型和不同安全级别的函数的最小上界强制转换

description.en: Future-compatibility warning for values exceeding c_int/c_uint ranges
description.zh: 对超出 c_int/c_uint 范围的判别值发出未来兼容性警告

description.en: Future-compatibility warning against ignoring repr(C) on repr(transparent) types
description.zh: 对 repr(transparent) 类型忽略 repr(C) 发出未来兼容性警告

description.en: Stabilized vector-related target features and is_s390x_feature_detected! macro
description.zh: 稳定化向量相关的目标特性和 is_s390x_feature_detected! 宏

title.zh: 可变参数函数参数警告

description.en: Future-incompatibility notice for ... patterns outside extern blocks
description.zh: 对 extern 块外使用 ... 模式发出未来不兼容警告

content.en: A major batch of API stabilizations covering MaybeUninit, slices, String/Vec raw parts, unchecked integer ops, VecDeque, Duration, char constants, and formatting utilities.
content.zh: 大批量 API 稳定化，涵盖 MaybeUninit、切片、String/Vec 原始部分、整数无检查操作、VecDeque、Duration、char 常量和格式化工具。

caption.zh: Rust 1.93.0 新稳定化 API 列表

desc.en: Get shared ref to initialized value
desc.zh: 获取已初始化值的共享引用

desc.en: Get mutable ref to initialized value
desc.zh: 获取已初始化值的可变引用
将切片视为固定大小数组

desc.en: Raw slice ptr as array ptr
desc.zh: 原始切片指针转数组指针

desc.en: Max bytes per char in UTF-8 (4)
desc.zh: UTF-8 每字符最大字节数 (4)

desc.en: Max u16 units per char in UTF-16 (2)
desc.zh: UTF-16 每字符最大 u16 数 (2)
从闭包创建 Display 实现

title.zh: 移除 Copy trait 特化

description.en: No longer uses specialization internally for Copy. May cause minor performance regressions but improves soundness.
description.zh: 不再对 Copy 内部使用特化。可能导致轻微性能退化，但提升了健全性。

description.en: Now supports thread-local storage and std::thread::current() calls
description.zh: 现在支持线程局部存储和 std::thread::current() 调用

description.en: No longer updates existing keys during append — only values are overwritten
description.zh: append 时不再更新已有的键——仅覆盖值

description.en: Removed the T: RefUnwindSafe requirement from IntoIter<T>
description.zh: 移除了 IntoIter<T> 的 T: RefUnwindSafe 要求

description.en: Stabilized compiler flag to control jump table emission for switch-like code
description.zh: 稳定化编译器标志，控制类 switch 代码的跳转表生成

description.en: riscv64a23-unknown-linux-gnu promoted to Tier 2 platform support
description.zh: riscv64a23-unknown-linux-gnu 提升至 Tier 2 平台支持

description.en: Now set in build scripts based on the active profile
description.zh: 现在根据当前 profile 在构建脚本中设置

description.en: Long-form template variables now supported in format strings
description.zh: 格式字符串中现在支持长格式模板变量

description.en: New flag for workspace-wide cleaning of build artifacts
description.zh: 新增标志，支持全工作区清理构建产物

text.en: 6 breaking changes in this release. Review carefully before upgrading.
text.zh: 本次发布包含 6 项破坏性变更，升级前请仔细检查。

description.en: Introduced into the compiler's attribute namespace; may conflict with existing user-defined pin_v2 attributes
description.zh: 引入编译器属性命名空间；可能与现有用户定义的 pin_v2 属性冲突

description.en: Bundled musl updated, may affect binaries targeting musl libc
description.zh: 捆绑的 musl 已更新，可能影响以 musl libc 为目标的二进制文件

description.en: Changed from JS-based to wasm exception handling; requires -fwasm-exceptions flag for linked C/C++ code
description.zh: 从基于 JS 的异常处理改为 wasm 异常处理；链接的 C/C++ 代码需添加 -fwasm-exceptions 标志

description.en: Previously silently ignored in various positions, now results in a hard error when misplaced
description.zh: 之前在多处被静默忽略，现在放置位置不当将直接报错

description.en: User types now checked for well-formedness, which may reject previously-accepted code
description.zh: 用户类型现在会检查格式良好性，可能拒绝之前可以通过的代码

description.en: No longer emits .crate files when build.build-dir is unset
description.zh: 当 build.build-dir 未设置时，不再生成 .crate 文件

title.zh: 注意：static-init crate 兼容性问题

content.en: The CARGO_CFG_DEBUG_ASSERTIONS environment variable may break static-init versions 1.0.1 through 1.0.3. Update to a newer version if affected.
content.zh: CARGO_CFG_DEBUG_ASSERTIONS 环境变量可能导致 static-init 1.0.1 至 1.0.3 版本不兼容。如受影响请升级到更新版本。

description.en: Use --document-private-items CLI flag instead
description.zh: 请改用 --document-private-items 命令行标志

description.en: Attribute and derive macros now included in the 'macros' search filter
description.zh: 属性宏和 derive 宏现已纳入 'macros' 搜索过滤器

description.en: New rustdoc::invalid_doc_attributes lint validates crate-level doc attributes
description.zh: 新增 rustdoc::invalid_doc_attributes lint，校验 crate 级文档属性

disclaimer.en: Data sourced from releases.rs. Verify against official Rust blog for critical decisions.
disclaimer.zh: 数据来源于 releases.rs，关键决策请以 Rust 官方博客为准。
